name: THE SUN AND THE SEA
description:
Short game made as an experimentation exercise in 15 minutes for @laracoteron concept design class.

I recommend playing it with the OST of "What remains of Edith Finch" as background music. I have a link here to a youtube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yf2dK2ZAlUs

This game is about solitude, inspiration, adventure,... about life itself. Contemplate ach picture and think about what it makes you feel.
